```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

# 1 import
```{r}
movies <- read_csv(here("data", "movies.csv"))
ratings <- read_csv(here("data", "ratings.csv"))
```

# 2 merged
```{r}
#! right join?

merged <- right_join(movies, ratings, by = "movieId")
dim(merged)
```

# 3 mean
```{r}
scores <- merged %>% 
        group_by(movieId) %>% 
        summarise(mean_rating = mean(rating))
scores
```
